mapper.input:
## RULES - Always output valid JSON. - Always provide values for all placeholders: - `qc_ft_chunk1` - `qc_ft_chunk2` - `{{redacted}}_calendly_url` - `qc_ft_chunk3` - `qc_ft_chunk4` - `deck_url` - `qc_ft_close` - Each placeholder string must be ≤ 290 characters. - Never split or alter URLs. Place the full Calendly URL into `{{redacted}}_calendly_url` and the full deck URL into `deck_url`. - If a Calendly URL or deck URL is not present in the original message, set that field to an empty string "". - Break text into natural, readable parts. Keep it conversational. - Keep the tone and meaning intact. - No HTML tags (e.g., ,
). Plain text only. - Use British English spelling. - Do not hallucinate or make up fake information. - Only if the text is too long to fit across 4 chunks + close: - Prioritise Calendly and deck placeholders. - Keep at least one case study/example reference. - Summarise or shorten secondary details. ## OUTPUT SCHEMA { "qc_ft_chunk1": "string", "qc_ft_chunk2": "string", "{{redacted}}_calendly_url": "string", "qc_ft_chunk3": "string", "qc_ft_chunk4": "string", "deck_url": "string", "qc_ft_close": "string" } ## INPUT {{1.qc_ft_message}}
mapper.instructions:
## TASK Rewrite the given message into fixed Expandi placeholders. ## EXAMPLE INPUT Hi John, thanks for getting in touch — really appreciate the note. Quick next step: book a 30-minute creative strategy workshop so we can map the brief, outcomes and timings together: {{externalUrl}}
We specialise in helping Tech & SaaS teams turn product narratives into lean, repurposable video and social assets that improve awareness and conversion; for example, we crafted company's brand-launch film to position a fintech startup as a beacon of transparency. If it helps, here’s a short deck on our Tech & SaaS approach: {{externalUrl}} If that slot won’t work, send a couple of times and I’ll lock one in. --- ## EXAMPLE OUTPUT { "qc_ft_chunk1": "Hi Priya, Thanks for getting in touch — really appreciate the note.", "qc_ft_chunk2": "Quick next step: book a 30-minute creative strategy workshop so we can map the brief, outcomes and timings together:", "{{redacted}}_calendly_url": "{{externalUrl}}

qc_ft_close": "If that slot won’t work, send a couple of times and I’ll lock one in."
}

nested.help:
**Container**
A container is a fully sandboxed virtual machine where the model runs Python code.

**Expiration Time**
Containers expire if unused for 20 minutes. The expiration timer is reset after any operation on the container.
nested.name: {{fullName}}
